title: Elf (Thieving)

properties.name: description
properties.value: Elves are citizens of Lletya and Prifddinas that can be talked to as well as pickpocketed from with level 85 Thieving. A player can only access the Lletya elves after starting Mourning's End Part I and the Prifddinas elves after completing Song of the Elves.

content:
This article is about the thieving information. For other uses, see Elf (disambiguation).
 This article has a money making guide: Pickpocketing elves.
Please add tips to the subpage, rather than the article below.

Elves are citizens of Lletya and Prifddinas that can be talked to as well as pickpocketed from with level 85 Thieving. A player can only access the Lletya elves after starting Mourning's End Part I and the Prifddinas elves after completing Song of the Elves.

Elves that can be pickpocketed in Lletya include:

  • Arvel
  • Goreu
  • Kelyn
  • Mawrth

Elves that can be pickpocketed in Prifddinas include:

  • Anaire
  • Aranwe
  • Aredhel
  • Caranthir
  • Celebrian
  • Celegorm
  • Cirdan
  • Curufin
  • Earwen
  • Edrahil
  • Elenwe
  • Elladan
  • Enel
  • Erestor
  • Enerdhil
  • Enelye
  • Feanor
  • Findis
  • Finduilas
  • Fingolfin
  • Fingon
  • Galathil
  • Gelmir
  • Glorfindel
  • Guilin
  • Hendor
  • Idril
  • Imin
  • Iminye
  • Indis
  • Ingwe
  • Ingwion
  • Lenwe
  • Lindir
  • Maeglin
  • Mahtan
  • Miriel
  • Mithrellas
  • Nellas
  • Nerdanel
  • Nimloth
  • Oropher
  • Orophin
  • Saeros
  • Salgant
  • Tatie
  • Thingol
  • Turgon
  • Vaire

Pickpocketing[edit | edit source]

Pickpocket chance[edit | edit source]

The chance of a successful pickpocket without boosts is 33.94% at level 85 and 39.2% at level 99.[1] This increases by 10% if the Thieving cape is worn and by another 10% with the completion of the hard Ardougne Diary, making the highest possible success rate 47.4%. A successful pickpocket yields coins or other items and 353.3 Thieving experience. Wearing the Rogues outfit will yield double loot.

Pickpocketing info[edit | edit source]

Elf
Level required 85
Thieving XP353.3 xp
TypePickpocket
ToolNone

Loot[edit | edit source]

Drop rates estimated based on 1,234,317 pickpockets from the Drop Rate Project, unless otherwise cited. A successful pickpocket attempt will gain one the following items:

Item Quantity Rarity Price High Alch
Coins280–350105/128280–350280–350
Death rune28/128372216
Nature rune35/128600324
Jug of wine16/12820
Diamond11/1281,8381,200
Fire orb12/1281,533180
Gold ore11/12830090

Elves in Prifddinas have the following two items added to the pickpocket loot table from regular elves, rolled before the main loot table:

Item Quantity Rarity Price High Alch
Crystal shard11/35Not soldN/A
Enhanced crystal teleport seed11/1,024[2]3,396,23160,000

Each successful pickpocket of Elves in Prifddinas is worth: 3,660.46, or 7,320.92 with the full rogue's outfit on top of the crystal shards.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Gallery (historical)[edit | edit source]
19 July 2005 –
8 August 2019 		8 August 2019 –
5 September 2019 		5 September 2019 –
present

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • All of the pickpocketable elves of Prifddinas are named after elves from J.R.R. Tolkien's Legendarium.
  • A certain line of dialogue for the Prifddinas elves prompts the player to say "That still only counts as one!" a likely reference to Gimli in The Return of the King.

References[edit | edit source]

  1. ^ Jagex. Mod Ash's Twitter account. 24 September 2019. (Archived from the original on 28 May 2020.) Mod Ash: "2.4% at level 1 (if that were allowed) and 39.2% at level 99. Interpolate linearly between those."
  2. ^ Jagex. Mod Lenny's Twitter account. 28 October 2019. (Archived from the original on 7 July 2020.)

{{otheruses|the thieving information|other uses|Elf (disambiguation)}} {{HasMMG|Pickpocketing elves}} [[File:Thief Elf.png|left]] '''Elves''' are citizens of [[Lletya]] and [[Prifddinas]] that can be talked to as well as pickpocketed from with level 85 [[Thieving]]. A player can only access the [[Lletya]] elves after starting [[Mourning's End Part I]] and the [[Prifddinas]] elves after completing [[Song of the Elves]]. Elves that can be pickpocketed in [[Lletya]] include: *[[Arvel]] *[[Goreu]] *[[Kelyn]] *[[Mawrth]] Elves that can be pickpocketed in [[Prifddinas]] include:
*[[Anaire]] *[[Aranwe]] *[[Aredhel]] *[[Caranthir]] *[[Celebrian]] *[[Celegorm]] *[[Cirdan]] *[[Curufin]] *[[Earwen]] *[[Edrahil]] *[[Elenwe]] *[[Elladan]] *[[Enel]] *[[Erestor]] *[[Enerdhil]] *[[Enelye]] *[[Feanor]] *[[Findis]] *[[Finduilas]] *[[Fingolfin]] *[[Fingon]] *[[Galathil]] *[[Gelmir]] *[[Glorfindel]] *[[Guilin]] *[[Hendor (elf)|Hendor]] *[[Idril]] *[[Imin]] *[[Iminye]] *[[Indis]] *[[Ingwe]] *[[Ingwion]] *[[Lenwe]] *[[Lindir]] *[[Maeglin]] *[[Mahtan]] *[[Miriel]] *[[Mithrellas]] *[[Nellas]] *[[Nerdanel]] *[[Nimloth]] *[[Oropher]] *[[Orophin]] *[[Saeros]] *[[Salgant]] *[[Tatie]] *[[Thingol]] *[[Turgon]] *[[Vaire]]
==Pickpocketing== ===Pickpocket chance=== The chance of a successful pickpocket without boosts is 33.94% at level 85 and 39.2% at level 99.{{CiteTwitter|author=Mod Ash|url=https://twitter.com/JagexAsh/status/1176446251337953280|date=24 September 2019|archiveurl=https://archive.is/hYi3y|archivedate=28 May 2020|quote=2.4% at level 1 (if that were allowed) and 39.2% at level 99. Interpolate linearly between those.}} This increases by 10% if the [[Thieving cape]] is worn and by another 10% with the completion of the [[hard Ardougne Diary]], making the highest possible success rate 47.4%. A successful pickpocket yields [[coins]] or other items and 353.3 [[Thieving]] experience. Wearing the [[Rogues outfit]] will yield double loot. {{Skilling success chart|label=Elf pickpocket chance|showbefore=no |label1=Normal|low1=6|high1=100|req1=85|color1=gray|image1=Thief Elf.png |label2=Gloves of silence|low2=6|high2=105|req2=85|color2=darkblue|image2=Gloves of silence.png |label3=Ardougne Diary|low3=6|high3=110|req3=85|color3=black|image3=Ardougne cloak 3.png |label4=Thieving cape + Ardougne Diary|low4=6|high4=121|req4=99|color4=purple|image4=Thieving cape.png |label5=Smooth Criminal 1|low5=6|high5=115|req5=85|color5=green|image5=Smooth_Criminal.png Cape|low9=9|high9=181|req9=99|color9=purple|image9=Smooth_Criminal.png }} ===Pickpocketing info=== {{Thieving info |name = Elf |level = 85 |xp = 353.3 |type = Pickpocket |tool = None }} ===Loot===
